Detailed Description

The simplayer class scans and compiles the user algos.

Definition at line 590 of file LibAlgoSim.h.

Member Function Documentation

void simplayer::ProcessDirectory ( string  path  ) 

Process the path; compiles all *.cpp files and builds a shared object. Then it uses dlopen() to get the pointer to the maker function which returns the pointer to the user algo class derived from IAlgoSim base class. This pointer is used to get user algos algorithm, blackboard and animation classes.

Parameters:
path the path to be processed

Definition at line 24 of file main.cpp.

Uses dirent utility to scan the given path and returns the list of subdirectories

Parameters:

Returns:
the vector<string> containing the sudrectories

map<string, create_t*> simplayer::CallList

A dictionary of scanned paths and its corresponding maker function pointer Only the one's which successfully compiled.
